item.title: Am I deserving?
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: Are you also sometimes asking yourself: Am I deserving of this? Am I deserving of having a great time? Am I deserving of having this amount of positive energy in my life? Am I worth it? And the answer to all of those is a resounding yes. Yes. Yes. Yes you are deserving and yes you are worthy. You are deserving and worthy of all good things and love. Full stop.
